question:
Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat. Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letter
	explain the reasons for the noise
	apologise
	describe what action you will take
text: I am writing to apologise for the constant howling of my dog. I know it is going on for a while, but I am trying to solve the situation as fast as I can.
Two weeks ago, unfortunately, he was hit by a car. He has got injuries all over his body and when he tries to move it is very painful for him and he starts to cry inconsolably.

Although I am administering medication, I think the dosage is too low to suppress the pain. So I have decided to take him to the veterinary and intern him there until he heals completely. It breaks my heart because I will not have him close to me, but I know this will be the best decision for him as well as us. Hopefully there in the animal centre, they will apply more effective painkillers so that, he will no longer suffer anymore.
I really apologise for all the inconveniences this caused you.

error_list.error_des: The word there doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
It seems that inconveniences may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
